title: What do you know, Ahri back up to highest playrate AND winrate midlane in Plat+
body: But hush hush, don't dare speak out against this champion or her success because the Ahri waifu clan will come in droves to downvote you. You shouldn't dare say how braindead easy of a champ this is with her mindless Q spam push, roam bot/top for gank, rinse and repeat. She's doing exactly what Ekko used to do when he was a priority pick. Stop fucking buffing this champ just to sell skins for your waifu playerbase. Either take some reliability/safety out of her goddamn kit, or reduce her Q damage to minions so she can't brainless push and roam.
